location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'APPENDIX J. DETAILS OF SQUADRON HUTTING RAS HILF MASIRA'

mods.abstract: Blueprint plan showing the squadron camp at Ras Hilf on Masira Island [Masirah Island xx Jazīrat Maşīrah], Oman. The plan highlights the details of the buildings that are parts of the camp and all their dimensions internal to ceiling.The plan is prepared by G S Cooper, Civil Engineer, Air Headquarters, Iraq as part of a report titled ‘REPORT ON SOUTH ARABIAN COAST- INSPECTION TOUR- SEPTEMBER, 1942’. The plan itself is marked as Appendix J.
